events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't been updated for several days.
System identified the request involves delivery delay based on customer complaint about late shipment and tracking issues.
A customer service agent was allocated to the case to address the reported shipping delay and provide assistance.
Hello! I understand your order hasn't arrived yet. I'm here to help you track down the shipment and resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have so I can investigate the delay for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the tracking number is TRACK987654. It shows the last update was six days ago.
I've contacted the shipping carrier and it appears there was an unexpected delay at the distribution center. Your package should arrive within 3 business days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate the prompt follow-up. I'll wait for the package to arrive in the next few days.
Your package has been delivered according to the latest tracking information. Please let us know if you encounter any further issues.
We are checking back to confirm you received your order and that everything is in good condition. Thank you for your patience.
Since there were no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Please contact us anytime if you need additional support.
